pyhpeimc.version module¶

This module contains contains a single function to return the current version of the pyhpeimc library. The function should return the current value the library and should be updated with every new version

pyhpeimc.version.version()[source]¶

Function takes no aruguments and returns a STR value of the current version of the library. This value should match the value in the test_machine.py :return str value of the current version of the library :rtype str

>>> version()
1.0.36
